All: Are you sure you want to do this?
If there is an account associated with %1 you will receive an email with a link to reset your password.
所有: 如果有与%1关联的账号，您将收到一封邮件，里面是重置密码的链接

All: Your password reset link has expired.
所有: 您的密码重置链接已过期

All: The first name cannot be empty.
The last name cannot be empty.

所有: 请更正这个邮箱的地址: "%1".

All: Please correct the password reset token.
Please specify the correct account and try again.
所有: 请指定正确的帐户，然后再试一次。

All: You cannot delete your own account.
所有: 您不能删除自己的账号

All: We can't find a user to delete.

所有: 不能删除自我分配的角色。

All: An error occurred while deleting this role.
An error occurred while saving this role.
A user with the same user name or email already exists.
所有: 有此用户名或邮箱的用户已存在

All: User Name is a required field.
First Name is a required field.
Last Name is a required field.

所有: 请输入有效的邮箱地址

All: The user name cannot be empty.
Your password must be at least %1 characters.
所有: 您的密码必须至少为%1个字符。

All: Your password must include both numeric and alphabetic characters.
所有: 您的密码必须包含数字和字母。

All: Your password confirmation must match your password.
所有: 您的密码确认必须您的密码匹配。

All: Forgot your user name or password?
所有: 忘记您的用户名或者密码？

All: Warning!\r\nThis action will remove this user from already assigned role\r\nAre you sure?
所有: 警告!\r\n此操作将把该用户从已分配的角色中删除\r\n您确认吗？

All: Warning!\r\nThis action will remove those users from already assigned roles\r\nAre you sure?
所有: 警告!\r\n此操作将把这些用户从已分配的角色中删除\r\n您确认吗？

All: Enter your email address.  You will receive an email with a link to reset your password.
所有: 请输入您的邮箱.您将接收到密码重置的邮件
